00034 namespace Hypertable {
00035 
00039   class OpenFileData : public ReferenceCount {
00040   public:
00041     virtual ~OpenFileData() { return; }
00042     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00043   };
00044   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<OpenFileData> OpenFileDataPtr;
00045 
00046 
00047   class OpenFileMap {
00048 
00049   public:
00050 
00051     void create(int fd, struct sockaddr_in &addr, OpenFileDataPtr &fdata) {
00052       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00053       fdata->addr = addr;
00054       m_file_map[fd] = fdata;
00055     }
00056 
00057     bool get(int fd, OpenFileDataPtr &fdata) {
00058       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00059       FileMap::iterator iter = m_file_map.find(fd);
00060       if (iter != m_file_map.end()) {
00061         fdata = (*iter).second;
00062         return true;
00063       }
00064       return false;
00065     }
00066 
00067     bool remove(int fd, OpenFileDataPtr &fdata) {
00068       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00069       FileMap::iterator iter = m_file_map.find(fd);
00070       if (iter != m_file_map.end()) {
00071         fdata = (*iter).second;
00072         m_file_map.erase(iter);
00073         return true;
00074       }
00075       return false;
00076     }
00077 
00078     void remove(int fd) {
00079       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00080       FileMap::iterator iter = m_file_map.find(fd);
00081       if (iter != m_file_map.end())
00082         m_file_map.erase(iter);
00083     }
00084 
00085     void remove_all(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00086       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00087       FileMap::iterator iter = m_file_map.begin();
00088 
00089       while (iter != m_file_map.end()) {
00090         if ((*iter).second->addr.sin_family == addr.sin_family &&
00091             (*iter).second->addr.sin_port == addr.sin_port &&
00092             (*iter).second->addr.sin_addr.s_addr == addr.sin_addr.s_addr) {
00093           FileMap::iterator del_it = iter;
00094           HT_ERRORF("Removing handle %d from open file map because of lost owning client connection", (*iter).first);
00095           iter++;
00096           m_file_map.erase(del_it);
00097         }
00098         else
00099           iter++;
00100       }
00101     }
00102 
00103     void remove_all() {
00104       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00105       m_file_map.clear();
00106     }
00107 
00108   private:
00109 
00110     typedef hash_map<int, OpenFileDataPtr> FileMap;
00111 
00112     boost::mutex  m_mutex;
00113     FileMap       m_file_map;
00114   };
00115 }
